To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

Serpentor/Ramhorn/Koga Shuko/Unitron/Hades/Anubis:



Serpentor rolled to the left, Striker's blasts missing him.  Putting his 
launcher in subspace, he took out his plasma rifle, firing off two plasma 
bolts at Striker from below.

===

Ramhorn exited the Ark, three laser blasts piercing his chest, knocking him 
back a foot.  Charging forward, weapon raised, a rocket exploded agianst his 
chest, sending him flying back several feet, landing in stasis lock.

---

Unitron entered the Ark, heading through the corridors quickly.

---

Hades fired off a rocket, the missile blowing off a few already damaged 
plates.

---

Anubis fired off a rocket from his missile launcher, off at the inside of the 
Ark, the rocket exploding against the left wall, leaving a huge dent, charred 
areas around the blast, and damaging Ramhorn even more.

---

Koga Shuko chuckled, firing off three laser bolts at the remains of an 
autogun.
